author: timbeiko
content:
I put together the following HackMD to track the various open issues that got discussed on the call today: https://notes.ethereum.org/@timbeiko/4844-open-issues

If I've missed something, please let me know and I'll add it. Not a great place to put this on GH yet, but I'll add it to eip4844.com

author: radekkapka
content: Thanks for the call, it was very interesting. I have a question about sidecars: in EIP-4844 will beacon nodes be required to download all sidecars? Some sidecars? No sidecars? My gut feeling is that data in sidecars is only interesting to rollups, but on the other hand without some form of sidecar validation you could put whatever you want as the blob reference, and the beacon node would just accept it.

author: terencechain
content: We'll download everything with a prune threshold
